relationships.description: Casual email correspondence discussing personal political views
Serrano expresses voting consideration for Trump
Implied comparison to Trump's controversial comments

analysis.purpose: To share personal political views and voting considerations with Jeffrey E.
analysis.significance: Shows an artist's personal political leanings and reaction to the 2016 Trump campaign controversy

notable_quotes: "I was prepared to vote against Trump for all the right reasons but I'm so disgusted by the outrage over 'grab them by the pussy' that I may give him my sympathy vote."
"I'm sure Bill C said things, too."

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion present - appears to be casual political discussion

illegal_activity.description: No illegal activity discussed - this is a personal political opinion exchange

public_knowledge.context: References the widely publicized 2016 Trump 'Access Hollywood' tape controversy and general political discourse

analysis.summary: Artist Andres Serrano emails Jeffrey E. expressing frustration with the political outrage over Trump's 'grab them by the pussy' comments, stating he may give Trump a 'sympathy vote' despite previously planning to vote against him, while also mentioning his art exhibition in Ireland called 'Torture'.
